back_cards.definition_en: Something difficult to explain or understand
back_cards.example_en: The mystery of the lost keys puzzled everyone.

back_cards.definition_en: A story involving suspense or intrigue
back_cards.example_en: She read a mystery novel by the fireplace.
The old house held a mystery for years.
His sudden absence was a complete mystery.
The cave’s markings remain a mystery to scientists.

back_cards.definition_en: A contest to determine a champion
back_cards.example_en: The team trained hard for the soccer championship.

back_cards.definition_en: The title or status of a champion
back_cards.example_en: She won the national championship in swimming.
The championship attracted thousands of fans.
He dreamed of winning a boxing championship.
The chess championship lasted three days.

back_cards.definition_en: To set up equipment for use
back_cards.example_en: They will install a new heater in the house.

back_cards.definition_en: To place software on a device
back_cards.example_en: He needs to install the update on his laptop.

back_cards.definition_en: To appoint someone to a position
back_cards.example_en: The board will install a new director.
She helped install lights in the garden.

back_cards.definition_en: To establish a system or device
back_cards.example_en: The company will install security cameras.
The children loved her tale of dragons.

back_cards.definition_en: A narrative of real or fictional events
back_cards.example_en: He shared a tale of his travels abroad.
The village has a tale about a ghost.
Grandma told a tale from her youth.

back_cards.definition_en: A story with a moral lesson
back_cards.example_en: The tale taught kindness and courage.
The monument stands for liberty and justice.

back_cards.definition_en: The right to choose or act
back_cards.example_en: She cherishes her liberty to travel.
Voting is a liberty in democratic nations.
He gained liberty after moving out.
The speech emphasized liberty for all.
The dog slept beneath the porch.
The ring was found beneath the couch.
He felt beneath others at the event.
Beneath her calm, she was nervous.
The valley lies beneath the hills.

back_cards.definition_en: A person traveling in a vehicle
back_cards.example_en: The passenger boarded the train early.
Passengers waited for the delayed flight.
She was a passenger in the taxi.

back_cards.definition_en: A member of a travel group
back_cards.example_en: The tour bus carried fifty passengers.
The ship’s passengers enjoyed the cruise.
The physician examined her sore throat.

back_cards.definition_en: A medical professional in a hospital
back_cards.example_en: He’s a physician specializing in cardiology.
The physician advised rest and fluids.
She consulted a physician for her pain.

back_cards.definition_en: A doctor in a clinical setting
back_cards.example_en: The physician wrote a prescription.

back_cards.definition_en: A person who completed a degree
back_cards.example_en: He’s a graduate of an engineering school.
The graduate received her diploma proudly.
The company hired a recent graduate.
She’s a graduate with honors.

back_cards.definition_en: A person with an academic degree
back_cards.example_en: The graduate started a new career.

back_cards.definition_en: Having a fine or keen edge
back_cards.example_en: The sharp blade sliced the apple cleanly.
Her sharp mind impressed the teacher.
A sharp pain stopped him from running.
The camera captured a sharp image.
He wore a sharp suit to the meeting.
The substance was tested for safety.

back_cards.definition_en: The core or essence of something
back_cards.example_en: His speech had substance and clarity.
The substance was found in the sample.
Her argument lacked any real substance.
The substance left a stain on the cloth.

back_cards.definition_en: The air or gases around Earth
back_cards.example_en: The atmosphere shields us from radiation.

back_cards.definition_en: The mood or tone of a place
back_cards.example_en: The café has a warm atmosphere.
The atmosphere’s layers were studied.
The party had a festive atmosphere.
The forest’s atmosphere felt serene.

back_cards.definition_en: To mix something by moving it
back_cards.example_en: She stirred the coffee with a spoon.
His words stirred the audience’s hearts.
He stirred the sauce to prevent burning.
The breeze stirred the curtains gently.
The speech stirred the crowd to act.
The Muslim attended prayers at the mosque.
She’s a Muslim who fasts during Ramadan.

back_cards.definition_en: A member of the Islamic community
back_cards.example_en: The Muslim shared traditions at the event.
He’s a Muslim dedicated to charity.
The Muslim family hosted an Eid celebration.

back_cards.definition_en: A section of text or writing
back_cards.example_en: He quoted a passage from the book.
The passage led to a secret room.
The passage of the ship was smooth.
The passage of years changed the town.
The passage inspired the listeners.
He added pepper to the pasta.
The salad includes red bell pepper.
She sprinkled pepper on her soup.
Pepper enhanced the dish’s taste.
The garden grew hot chili peppers.
She will emphasize safety in the training.
The coach emphasized teamwork.
He emphasized his point with examples.

back_cards.definition_en: To focus on a key idea
back_cards.example_en: The ad emphasizes the car’s features.
The teacher emphasized the lesson’s value.
The cable powers the entire office.
She plugged in the charging cable.
The bridge is supported by steel cables.
Internet cables run under the sea.
They subscribed to a cable TV plan.

back_cards.definition_en: A four-sided shape with equal sides
back_cards.example_en: The floor tiles are cut into squares.

back_cards.definition_en: An open public area in a city
back_cards.example_en: The market is in the town square.

back_cards.definition_en: A mathematical term for a number
back_cards.example_en: The square of five is twenty-five.
The builder used a square for accuracy.
The lot is one hundred square meters.
She followed a recipe for lasagna.
The recipe requires fresh tomatoes.

back_cards.definition_en: A method for achieving a goal
back_cards.example_en: Consistency is the recipe for progress.
He shared a recipe for soup.

back_cards.definition_en: A plan for a culinary dish
back_cards.example_en: The recipe made a tasty dessert.
